_header: Omnes gentes plaudite / Car nostre saueyour est ne
_description: A macaronic carol of the Nativity in Latin, French, and English — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Nouo profusi gaudio / Benedicamus domino’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Omnes gentes plauditeCar nostres saueyour est neOuer all
                    blyssyd he beRex alpha et Oo…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…ffortime de grace et de pyteOf all thi goodness we þank
                    þeBendicamus domio
